channel.title: Reply All
channel.description: "'A podcast about the internet' that is actually an unfailingly original exploration of modern life and how to survive it." - The Guardian. Hosted by PJ Vogt and Alex Goldman, from Gimlet.
channel.itunes:subtitle: "'A podcast about the internet' that is actually an unfailingly original exploration of modern life and how to survive it." - The Guardian. Hosted by PJ Vogt and Alex Goldman, from Gimlet.
channel.itunes:author: Gimlet

item.title: #1 A Stranger Says I Love You
item.description: What happens when a woman sends a stocky blond stranger to tell her ex she loves him.
item.itunes:author: Gimlet
item.itunes:subtitle: What happens when a woman sends a stocky blond st…

item.dc:creator: Gimlet

item.title: #2 The Secret, Gruesome Internet For Doctors
item.description: An app called Figure One wants to be Instagram, but for doctors. Why would doctors need their own Instagram? We spy on the secret & disgusting medical internet, plus we speak to one of its residents.
item.itunes:author: Gimlet
item.itunes:subtitle: An app called Figure One wants to be Instagram, b…
item.itunes:summary: An app called Figure One wants to be Instagram, but for doctors. Why would doctors need their own Instagram? We spy on the secret & disgusting medical internet, plus we speak to one of its residents.
item.dc:creator: Gimlet
